## About me 
I am a post-graduate student pursuing a [Master of IT in Business (Analytics)](https://scis.smu.edu.sg/master-it-business) at Singapore Management University.
Before venturing into the world of analytics, I spent 6 years in the auditing and financial due diligence department at PwC Singapore. 


## About this blog
This blog is dedicated to showcase my assignments and project work relating to the Visual Analytics and Applications course (ISSS608) at Singapore Management University.
